title: How to Find the Best Family Health Insurance Plan? (SahilDoshi)
text: By SahilDoshi Jul 31, 2015 The stressful lifestyle and poor eating habits have resulted into uprising of major medical problems, leading to which you might be spending your monthly income and even the savings on medical expenses or hospitalization cost. To put an end to this that is equally atrocious and dispiriting, you must get a good family health insurance plan that covers for your medicinal cost, pre- and post-hospitalization expense, laboratory test cost and even critical illnesses. As it is said, "Health is wealth", getting a family health insurance is the best way to keep you prepared to handle sudden medical crisis that might come your way. A family health insurance policy acts as a helping hand in worst case scenarios and helps you to come out of the situation without facing any difficulty. There are many insurance companies in India that offer family health insurance plans to their customers. To get the best family health insurance plan as per your requirement, listed below are a few factors that you must consider closely to make the right decision: # 1 Plan category : There is a comprehensive list of insurance plans offered by the insurance companies in India. The foremost thing that you must do is to plan your category like which insurance would suit your need and benefit you in the longer run. You must also understand the co-payments and sub-limits that you might need to pay for the insurance policy. You should understand and assess this factor according to your requirement and paying capability to get maximum benefit out of the family health insurance plan.# 2 Check Monthly premiums : Monthly premiums is the amount of money that you need to pay to the insurance company every month whether you use medical services or not. Before choosing a policy, it is always good to calculate the monthly premium of your policy in advance so as to avoid overspending upon it in future. The amount of coverage, insurance riders and the kind of policy you choose are a few factors that determine the monthly premium of your policy. Also, it is believed that the more coverage you need, the higher the premium will be. So pick the policy wisely and save big on policy premiums. #3 Out-of-the-pocket cost : You must determine the cost that you need to pay out of the pocket so as to avail any service. These out-of-the-pocket costs are extra costs apart from your monthly premiums. You must know all about it beforehand to avoid future confusion. #4 Type of insurance plan and provider network : Different insurance plans provide different level of coverage for the care you get inside and outside the policies network of doctors, hospitals, drugstores and other medical service providers. Since the coverage and the premiums of the policy differ from one insurance company to other, you must look carefully on this factor while purchasing the policy. Choose a reputed company to get the policy from and determine your requirement beforehand to end up with a good purchase. #5 Benefits : It is the last and the most important factor that you must consider while purchasing a family health insurance policy. Typically, insurance company claim big benefits initially to woo you and later fail to keep up their promise. Therefore you must not opt for a "too good to be true" policy and understand all the benefits associated with the policy you are purchasing. All the family health insurance plans sold in India provide essential health benefits, cover pre-existing conditions and offer free preventive services. So check for all the benefits and choose wisely. About the Author Sahil Doshi is content writer who has interest in sharing knowledge regarding various types of general insurance policies . In this article, he has focused over the tips to find the best family health insurance policy . Rating:
